displayName.english: You've done a lot to get here.

description.english: Find a secret path in W2-L3
Beat the game while the player is fully invisible!
Beat the game while grayscale is enabled!
Gather every skin in the game!
Gather every hat in the game!
Earn a bronze medal from a challenge!
Earn a silver medal from a challenge!
Earn a golden medal from a challenge!
Earn a diamond medal from a challenge!
Have 5 challenges that have a diamond medal.
Have 5 challenges that have a 'Perfect' rating.
Make your first level and then save it!
Play or load a level editor level!
Have 100 credits in your current balance!
Save 1,000 credits in your current balance!
Save 10,000 credits in your current balance!
Beat the game with reversed controls! (Reversed Left/Right and Jump/Interact)
Realise that you can't skip a level and that you basically ran out of coins to spend.
Play your own Custom Endless Run!
UserBenchmarks is nothing compared to this! Run the game on MAX settings!
Find and talk to the Hat Merchant
Beat the main game! But, is it really over yet?
Discover the Hardmode section of the game.
Beat the Hardmode for the first time! (Or beat the game on Medium)
You clicked the hotdog! Are you proud of yourself?
Beat Hardmode on the Difficult Difficulty
Beat Hardmode on the Insane Difficulty
Beat Hardmode on the Ridiculous Difficulty
What could possibly go wrong now?
Make and save a level that has 500 or more objects.
Wait, SSU reference?!! Well the ship isn't very pleased with you that you came here.
Need more? Then give us your house!
Set yourself on fire with torches!
Reach the maximum difficulty possible in Endless Run!
Reach 1T Credits by selling all of your valuables to Infiland Arts

displayName.english: Is my life really like this?
I died at the last second!
Now I am using two hands!
